channel.title: Staticanimation
channel.description: Hi, I'm trying to make my full range, and i have everything, but it doesn't pull the arrow back, and I tried making it work, but when i do, it just does it facing south, and not the NPC, which just looks rubbish, anyone know how to make it face the same way my projectile is going?

item.title: Staticanimation
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Hi, I’m trying to make my full range, and i have everything, but it doesn’t pull the arrow back, and I tried making it work, but when i do, it just does it facing south, and not the NPC, which just looks rubbish, anyone know how to make it face the same way my projectile is going?

Read full topic
